posts.post_content:
You missed out on a very nice one in the previous Huggins and Scott auction. The autograph was great without it being punched out. Plus, his wife endorsed it on the back.

Cy

yes cy, thanks for twisting the knife.  that check was like having 2 cobb signatures...i could've cut the check up and send one to PSA and the other to JSA.

something like that would be perfect here.

edit: only looking for a cobb check, not anything else.

bump for $900...

got my cobb check so looking for straight sale on the card.
